name: Boozoo Chavis
description: '''Wilson Anthony''' "'''Boozoo'''" '''Chavis''' (pronounced CHAY-viss) (October 23, 1930 – May 5, 2001) was an American [[accordion]] player, singer, songwriter and bandleader.  He was one of the pioneers of [[zydeco]], the fusion of Louisiana Creole and [[blues]] music developed in southwest [[Louisiana]].
